job.title: Software Developer Manager - Machine Learning
job.description:
Summary
Apple’s GPU Compute and Advance Rending team provides a suite of high performance GPU algorithms and computation graph for developers inside and outside of Apple for iOS, macOS and tvOS. Team is passionate about providing acceleration for machine learning frameworks like TensorFlow & PyTorch, and algorithms across machine learning, linear algebra, image processing and ray tracing on Apple’s GPUs. We are always looking for exceptionally hardworking individuals to grow our outstanding team.


Key Qualifications
Proven programming and problem solving skills

Good understanding of machine learning fundamentals

Experience with system level programming and computer architecture

Strong communication and teamwork skills


Description
Our team is looking for an engineering manager to lead the team responsible for building and maintaining GPU acceleration support for machine learning frameworks like TensorFlow and PyTorch, and collaborating with driver, compiler, metal frameworks and hardware groups to provide the best acceleration of ML Training on current and future HW. The ideal candidate would have previous technical leadership experience, Machine Learning experience, understanding of GPU architecture, and be willing to learn about new technologies.


Education & Experience
BS or MS Degree or equivalent experience.


Additional Requirements
- Experience with machine learning libraries (TensorFlow. PyTorch); adding runt time and computation graph support is a plus


- Experience with high performance parallel programming, GPU programming experience a plus


Role Number: 200259247
